name: Two Cats
description:
STORY 

Two cats were living in his home quietly, but, a portal appeared. The two cats were pulled through the portal. Then they ended up in a dangerous tower. Help them get home!

GAMEPLAY 

Two Cats is a local multiplayer platform game for 2 players. Two Cats has 20 short levels. Each level is based on going down a tower.

At last, if you find a bug, wanna make a Two Cats meme or fan-art, or just wanna talk with other Two Cats fans, join this discord server: https://discord.gg/BfT3FUxxmm
